industry: Real Estate and Business Consulting and Services
description:
https://franchise.remax.com/brokerage-support/
Job Summary:
This role will be instrumental in providing guidance and support to our network of new brokers/owners during the onboarding stage. The position will focus on ensuring that our brokers are equipped with the necessary skills and knowledge to leverage technology effectively in their business. Additionally, this role will require a strong understanding of real estate processes, excellent communication skills, and the ability to train and guide individuals with varying levels of technological proficiency.

Essential Functions:
• Conducts training sessions and workshops to educate brokers/owners and agents on the effective use of company technology tools and platforms, including but not limited to CRM systems, mobile apps, online marketing platforms, and transaction management software. Offers ongoing support and troubleshooting assistance to resolve any technical issues or challenges agents and brokers face.
• Collaborates with internal teams to develop comprehensive onboarding strategies for new tools and platforms. Creates training materials, documentation, and video tutorials to facilitate self-paced learning and ensure a smooth transition for real estate professionals.
• Provides one-on-one consulting sessions to address specific technology-related needs, goals, and challenges faced by our broker/owners. Conducts group sessions to address common issues, share best practices, and foster a collaborative learning environment.
• Continuously evaluates the effectiveness of technology onboarding and training programs. Collects feedback from agents, brokers, and stakeholders to identify areas for improvement and implement enhancements to streamline the onboarding process.
• Tracks and monitors technology adoption rates within the company network. Identify offices that may require additional support or intervention to ensure optimal utilization of available technology tools.
• Stays up-to-date with the latest technology trends and innovations within the real estate industry. Conducts research to identify emerging tools and platforms that could enhance the productivity and efficiency of real estate professionals.
• Travel required to our broker/owner offices.
• Other Duties as assigned.

Minimum Qualifications:
Education: Bachelor's Degree or Equivalent experience
Years of Experience: 2-4 Years
Years of Management: No Experience Needed

Preferred Licensing, Certifications and Skills:
• Experience in the real estate industry, preferably in customer success, technology training, or support roles

Standard Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities:
•Technical/Functional Expertise: Has knowledge of the job, function, department, and its impact on customers, continues to learn and grow, stays current on changes in process, policy, and function, and fulfills responsibilities of the job
•Customer & Relationship Focus: Anticipates and delivers on customer needs, manages internal/external relationships, respectful of team, resolves problems, responds with tact and diplomacy, shares pride of the brand with customers, preserves the culture
•Decision Quality: Makes sound decisions quickly, gathers information, considers long-term repercussions of decisions, is accountable for decisions
•Drives for Results and Quality: Takes ownership of job assignments and productivity, takes initiative, focuses on the quality and quantity of results, sets priorities and meets deadlines, and keeps management apprised of progress

Hire Range/Rate:
$55,000 - $67,000
Actual compensation offered to candidate will be finalized at offer and may be above or below the posted range due to skill level, experience, industry specific knowledge, education/certifications, or geographic location. The offer rate represents one component of the RE/MAX Holdings total compensation package. Employees will also receive a number of benefits as listed below. Other compensation for this position may include bonus eligibility.
  • Competitive Medical, Dental, and Vision benefits
  • Retirement plans with optimal company match
  • Annual bonus/merit opportunity
  • Educational Assistance
  • Medical Health support program
  • M.O.R.E. Events offered in-person and virtually
  • Mentorship program
  • Employee Resource Groups

All persons shall be afforded equal employment opportunity.
